title: Harmonic View Of Next Week's Market - FX Pairs
text:
Disclaimer: The views shared through tweets are personal and not of my employer. Harmonic patterns are correction patterns and not reversal patterns. Any position must be taken after a thorough research.

Volatility is imminent in the coming days with Brexit events, Syrian-Kurdish conflict, and US-China trade war continuations, therefore, caution have to be taken while trading. Below are chart projections of Harmonic patterns (ABCD to be precise) that forecast some small inflection points along the way. Profits can be taken when prices react from the below grey box (Potential Reversal Zone) and retrace 38.2% from the beginning of the pattern.

1. : Following a perfect 0.618/1.618, the pair is likely to find resistance around the grey box with the RSI approaching its resistance levels as well.

AUDUSD H3

2. : Consolidation is expected following the intermediate ABCD pattern inside the bigger pattern. The RSI is also showing a good resistance level from where a nice short can be initiated.

EURUSD H3

3. : The pair is showing a confluence of two ABCD patterns at around 1.3075 that provides a good bullish opportunity.

USDCAD H3

4. : This is probably my favourite one with an imminent ABCD pattern and bullish signal on the RSI.

USDCHF H3

5. : A far yet not so far short opportunity on the USDJPY is established following a 0.500/2.000 ABCD. Caution has to be taken with this pair as it tends to react violently to major political events (risk-on / risk-off)

USDJPY H3

In conclusion, it is always better to not initiate a trade than to initiate one and regret it. Fundamental events are huge these days and they impact markets severely, the best thing to do is to be well prepared and not rely on one type of analysis.
description: Forex Analysis by Sofien Kaabar covering: EUR/USD, USD/JPY, USD/CHF, AUD/USD. Read Sofien Kaabar's latest article on Investing.com
